casebody.data:
Charles G. Morgenroth and Marie Morgenroth, appellees, v. Midland Oil Company, appellant.Gen. No. 37,594.Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1934.

McSurely, J., dissents.

Opinion filed May 6, 1935.Cassels, Potter & Bentley and Edward J. Rothman, for appellant; Ralph F. Potter, Leslie H. Vogel and E. Douglas Sehwantes, of counsel. Bernard W. Vinissky and Julius S. Neale, for appellees. Mr. Justice Hatchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
